verbs.description: [ARG1: rosemont public safety officer] [V: charged] [ARG2: with armed robbery] had earlier interactions with convicted felon a rosemont public safety sergeant charged with armed robbery last month had been accused of using his position with the department to get a large group of individuals including a convicted felon into an event at the allstate arena without tickets or security checks earlier this year according to legal documents filed by the department superintendent rosemont public safety department public safety rosemont donald e stephens iii public rosemont department of public safety park ridge officer robbery sgt edward j karas donald e stephens iii sgt edward j karas rosemont public safety allstate arena
